author: Kiril Nikolaev
title: Here’s Why Mark Cuban Is Right About Amazon – And Why Morgan Stanley Is Wrong
description:
Mark Cuban is bullish on Amazon, while Morgan Stanley says to lock-in profits. Fundamentals favor Cuban's view as AMZN has upside potential.

content:
• Morgan Stanley says that its time to lock in profits on Amazon.
  • Mark Cuban that the e-commerce company has more upside potential.
  • The fundamentals appear to be in Cubans corner.
